summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM admin features including configurable lists (Banks, Dealers, Cars), trash functionality, and admin panel with 5 tabs. Backend APIs are fully functional, frontend admin interface is working correctly with all expected features.

design_issues.issue: Session expires quickly requiring frequent re-login during testing

passed_tests: Backend API - All 16/16 admin features tests passed (100% success rate)
Backend API - Config lists endpoints (banks, dealers, cars) working correctly
Backend API - Banks list contains 33+ US banks as expected
Backend API - Dealers list contains Downey and Long Beach as expected
Backend API - Cars list contains 60+ car models
Backend API - Add/delete functionality for config lists working
Backend API - Trash functionality (soft delete, restore, permanent delete) working
Backend API - Admin users management endpoints working
Frontend - Admin page with all 5 tabs (Users, Banks, Dealers, Autos, Trash) found and functional
Frontend - Banks tab shows 34 bank items with add/delete interface
Frontend - Dealers tab shows expected dealers (Downey, Long Beach) with management interface
Frontend - Cars/Autos tab with management interface
Frontend - Trash tab with deleted clients and records sections
Frontend - Users tab with user management controls (role selectors, activation toggles)
Frontend - Admin navigation and page routing working correctly

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor session management issue)
